classes.name: Base
classes.description: Base class for any entity returned by the Twitch API.

classes.name: Cache
classes.description:
Implements some sort of LFU cache with a few utility methods.
Built specifically for entity managers.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to configure the caching behaviour.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the entire cache.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a value from the cache.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets or updates a key to a new value.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a key from the cache.

methods.name: has
methods.description: Returns true if the cache holds the key.

methods.name: find
methods.description: Performs a search operation on the cache's values.

classes.name: Client
classes.description:
The main client to interact with the Twitch API.
Supports app and user access tokens and is configurable.
Delegates API endpoints to different managers.

construct.name: Client
construct.description: Creates a new client to interact with the Twitch API.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in the client and retrieves an app access token.

returns.description: The new access token or OAuth details object.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description:
Destroys the client and revokes its access token.

TODO: Add a destroy method on managers as well and call it here.

returns.description: Nothing.

methods.name: setInterval
methods.description: Sets an interval to be managed by the client.

methods.name: setTimeout
methods.description: Sets a timeout to be managed by the client.

methods.name: clearInterval
methods.description: Clears an interval managed by the client.

methods.name: clearTimeout
methods.description: Clears a timeout managed by the client.

methods.name: on
methods.description: Adds an event listener to the client.

returns.description: The client instance.

methods.name: once
methods.description: Adds an event listener to the client, but the listener gets removed as soon as an event is received.

returns.description: The client instance.

events.name: ready
events.description: Emitted when the client has been set up.

events.name: destroy
events.description: Emitted when the client has been destroyed.

events.name: channelCreate
events.description: Emitted when a new Channel instance has been created.

events.name: userCreate
events.description: Emitted when a new User instance has been created.

events.name: channelEmoteCreate
events.description: Emitted when a new ChannelEmote instance has been created.

events.name: channelEmoteSetCreate
events.description: Emitted when a new ChannelEmoteSet instance has been created.

classes.name: Manager
classes.description: Manager superclass with a cache and method to fetch entities.

classes.name: Channel
classes.description: Twitch API's channel entity represented in a class.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates this instance with newly fetched data.

returns.description: True if the update was successful.

classes.name: ChannelEmote
classes.description: An emote used in a channel on Twitch.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates this emote with newly fetched data from the API.

returns.description: True if the update was successful.

construct.name: ChannelEmoteManager
construct.description: Constructs a new channel emote manager.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches emotes from the channel.

construct.name: ChannelEmoteSet
construct.description: Creates a new channel emote set.

props.name: emotes
props.description: The set of emotes in this set.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates this instance with new data from the API.

returns.description: True if the update was successful.

classes.name: ChannelEmoteSetManager
classes.description: Manages emote sets in a channel.

construct.name: ChannelEmoteSetManager
construct.description: Creates a new channel emote set manager.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches an emote set from the API.

params.name: id
params.description: ID of the emote set to fetch.

returns.description: The fetched emote set.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches a channel from the Twitch API.

params.name: force
params.description: Skip cache check and request directly from the API.

classes.name: Emote
classes.description: Represents a global emote on Twitch.

construct.name: Emote
construct.description: Constructs an Emote from the client and raw data.

params.name: client
params.description: The client this emote belongs to

params.name: data
params.description: The raw data provided by the api

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates this emote's data.

returns.description: True if the update was succesful.

construct.name: EmoteManager
construct.description: Constructs an EmoteManager for the client.

params.name: client
params.description: The client that this manager belongs to

methods.name: get
methods.description: Returns the emote with the given ID in cache or undefined.

params.name: id
params.description: the ID of the emote to get

returns.description: the emote with the given ID

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches global emotes from Twitch.

params.name: id
params.description: Fetches the emote with this ID.

returns.description: The fetched emotes.

classes.name: ClientUser
classes.description: User representing the client on Twitch.

props.name: login
props.description: The user's login name (username but all lowercase).

props.name: viewCount
props.description: Total number of views on this user's channel.

props.name: email
props.description: Returns the email of the user (scope `user:read:email` is required).

props.name: createdAt
props.description: The Date object when the user was created.

props.name: createdTimestamp
props.description: The unix timestamp when the user was created.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Updates the description of this user.

methods.name: avatarURL
methods.description:
Returns the user's avatar URL.
If `options.offline` is true, the offline avatar will be returned.

returns.description: The user's avatar URL.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates this user object to hold the newest data.

returns.description: True if the update was successful.

methods.name: block
methods.description: Blocks the user. Requires the `user:manage:blocked_users` scope.

returns.description: True if the user was unblocked.

methods.name: unblock
methods.description: Unblocks the given user. Requires the `user:manage:blocked_users` scope.

returns.description: True if the user was unblocked.

methods.name: fetchBlocks
methods.description: Returns an array of users that are blocked by this user.

returns.description: An array of users that are blocked.

construct.name: User
construct.description: Creates a user from the given client and

params.name: data
params.description: The raw data provided by the Twitch API.

props.name: login
props.description: The user's login name (username but all lowercase).

props.name: viewCount
props.description: Total number of views on this user's channel.

props.name: email
props.description: Returns the email of the user (scope `user:read:email` is required).

props.name: createdAt
props.description: The Date object when the user was created.

props.name: createdTimestamp
props.description: The unix timestamp when the user was created.

methods.name: avatarURL
methods.description:
Returns the user's avatar URL.
If `options.offline` is true, the offline avatar will be returned.

returns.description: The user's avatar URL.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates this user object to hold the newest data.

returns.description: True if the update was successful.

methods.name: block
methods.description: Blocks the user. Requires the `user:manage:blocked_users` scope.

returns.description: True if the user was unblocked.

methods.name: unblock
methods.description: Unblocks the given user. Requires the `user:manage:blocked_users` scope.

returns.description: True if the user was unblocked.

methods.name: fetchBlocks
methods.description: Returns an array of users that are blocked by this user.

returns.description: An array of users that are blocked.

params.name: client
params.description: The client that insantiated this manager.

props.name: client
props.description: The client that insantiated this manager.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetch for users from the API with IDs or logins.

returns.description: The fetched users.

props.name: force
props.description: Skip cache check and request directly from the API.

props.name: suppressRejections
props.description: Suppresses any rejections coming from the PubSub instance.
